name: Is this a dating sim?
description:
Team #16 Azn Burning

As you start the dating simulator, naturally, your goal is to swoon the beautiful lady. By clicking your answer out of the three choices on the right, the conversation will progress until she asks you to prove yourself worthy. You will then enter an adventure game, where your goal is to obtain the holy sword.

http://kucingbudhug.deviantart.com/art/Simple-plat...

https://rpgmaker.net/musicpack/
